title: Randeep Hooda charms foreign co-actors in 'Main Aur Charles'
text:
Randeep Hooda's protagonist in his upcoming movie, Main Aur Charles , is inspired by the infamous French criminal Charles Sobhraj. The actor impressed his film's co-stars from Brazil, Russia, France, Iran, UK and Croatia with his charming personality and acting prowess.
According to Russian actress Anastasia, who plays a tourist in the movie, "Randeep looks, talks and acts just like a Hollywood actor and it was a great experience working with him." Paula, who's from Brazil, says, "I wish I could play his wife again and again." Croatian artiste Dijana, who essays a lawyer's role, concedes, "In the film, I'm the only female character who doesn't get influenced by his charms because I know him in and out."
READ: 'Main Aur Charles' trailer: Randeep Hooda returns to kill
Says, writer-director Prawaal Raman, "Whether I should blame the character I wrote or Randeep's inherent charm is debatable. I'd rather enjoy the credit of giving him an extra edge over his flamboyant ways."
Now it is for the audience to decide if it was Charles or Randeep who wooed the girls in this film that is produced by Raju Chadha, Amit Kapoor and Vikram Khakhar.
Main Aur Charles , presented by Wave Cinemas Ponty Chadha and produced by Cynozure Networkz, releases October 30.
